meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strange or unconventional.
meanings.sent1: Her freakiness in fashion choices always stood out.
meanings.sent2: The freakiness of the situation made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: His freakiness in trying new foods led to some interesting dinner parties.
meanings.sent4: The freakiness of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The freakiness of the clown's costume scared the children at the party.

meanings.definition: The tendency to behave in an unconventional or unpredictable manner.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's freakiness on stage kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent2: I never know what to expect from her freakiness at work.
meanings.sent3: His freakiness in planning surprises always brought smiles to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The freakiness of the weather lately has been causing delays.
meanings.sent5: The freakiness of his dance moves amazed everyone at the talent show.
